summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4580 for the improvement of 54th Avenue South, from Roxbury Street to Renton Avenue; by constructing wood curbs and gutters and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 53461, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
